arts.sum: Keita Baldé (29) is on his way back to Serie A after a short spell in Turkey. The former AS Monaco striker has joined Monza for the remainder of the…

arts.ttl: AS Monaco suffer double injury blow
arts.sum: AS Monaco have an uphill task to qualify for the next round of the UEFA Champions League. They head to Lisbon next week to face Benfica with a one-goal deficit…

arts.ttl: Alban Lafont and Fabien Centonze reinstated into the Nantes squad

arts.ttl: Monaco's alarming slide dims the high expectations early in the season
arts.sum: After taking charge, Fonseca pledged to play a more attacking style and Lyon has scored six goals in his two matches so far — including a 4-0 win against Reims last weekend which saw four different players scoring. While unbeaten Ligue 1 leader Paris Saint-Germain has pulled 16 points clear of fourth-place Monaco and seems too far ahead to be caught, Monaco is looking over its shoulder.

arts.ttl: Venezia opt against signing former Monaco captain Wissam Ben Yedder

arts.ttl: Preview: Monaco vs. Nantes - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Ligue 1 clash between Monaco and Nantes, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
